jobFunction: Sales, Customer Service, and Human Resources
description:
We are expanding in 2024!

At Superus Careers we match high quality candidates with high quality careers.

We are looking for hungry and humble Recruiters who are detail oriented, have excellent interpersonal skills and driven for success. A positive attitude and tireless work ethic are a must!

Responsibilities for Recruiter
  • Source candidates using a variety of search methods to build a robust candidate pipeline
  • Screen candidates by reviewing resumes and job applications, and performing phone screenings
  • Take ownership of the entire candidate experience from initial contact to client onboarding
  • Ensure all screening, hiring, and selection is done in accordance with employment laws and regulations


Qualifications for Recruiter
  • Bachelor's Degree
  • Ability to communicate effectively, both orally and in writing
  • Demonstrated ability to establish effective and cooperative working relationships built on trust
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills
  • Ability to manage a wide range of relationships with a variety of stakeholders
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office
  • Working knowledge of interview techniques and applicant screening methods
  • Working knowledge of applicant tracking and HRIS systems a plus
